title: Hero Motocorp launches Xtreme 125R at Rs 95,000: Price, mileage, speed and other features
description: A 125cc, single-cylinder, air-cooled engine powers the new bike. It can produce out 11.5 bhp and 10.5Nm and comes mated to a five-speed gearbox.
